messages.body: Ahoy, young squire! I require the report on squanchberries, posthaste! Make sure it sails through the digital seas to my inbox!
Greetings, oh illustrious leader! To which sacred email vessel should I deliver said report? Squanchberries must be respected, after all.
Ah, indeed! Send it forth to lordofberries@fruityempire.com. And ensure it's pronto! The squanches wait for no one.
Report en route to lordofberries@fruityempire.com, my liege! The squanchberries will be honoured with utmost urgency!
